page.title: 09THE LOCAL SHOPS
page.content: I went to the Crusty Loaf. We asked questions to the lady and the shop is 22 years old. Monday is the day when the most people come in. Saturday is the least popular day when people come in. When we were there some people came to get some cakes. They sell health foods and fresh cream. Three people work there.{Philip Hall}Aged 8 ...................................... I went to the video shop. We saw lots of videos. I was with Mrs. Holland and we went to the Magic Box and the little sweets were 10p. I said,"How old is the building?"The man said "23 years old." At the back of the three buildings there is Hotsons and Hotsons has 3 telephones. At the wall at the side it said Hotson and Son. Another shop was King and King the Estate Agents. {Simon Weaver} Aged 8 years
